tldr_points: Choose the right documentation type: tutorials for training, how-to guides for problem-solving, explanations for understanding, or reference notes for features.
Well-structured documentation reduces customer support tickets by enabling users to resolve issues independently and feel more empowered.
Use multimedia elements like videos and images within documentation platforms to improve user comprehension and boost SEO performance.
Implement searchable documentation with regular updates and version control to maintain relevance and accessibility over time.
